original: Eiserman, Carl Sixten, direktör, Borås, f. 2/2/95 i Borås av dir. Carl E. o. Otilda Gadde. G. 20 m. Andrea Äkerlund. Barn: Barbro f. 21, Carl-Otto 28. — Stud:€x. 13, Köniigl. TeChn’. f. Textildnd. i Reutlingen 14, DHS 17, res :0’f>f :ex. 17. V. verksl. dir. i A-B Sv:es Fören. Trikåfabr. 20-31, verkst. dir. i Åkerlunds Bomulfespinneri A-B 31-38, i Drufvefors Väfveri A-B 36-38 o. verkst. dir. i Åkerlunds Bomulissp. i Borås sed. 38. Ordf. i styr. s-amt v. ordf. i Sv. Hand :banken i Borås, A-B Borås Tidn., ordf. o. verkst. dir. i A-B Sv:es Fören. Trikåfabr., led. av styr. f. Kilsunds’ A-B, led. av överstyr, f. Sv:es textilind :förb., v. ordf. i de&s Borås-krets, v. ordf. i Västergötl. o. n. Hall. hand :kamm. arb :utsk., led. av stadsfullm. i Borås 30-38, av desis be-redn:utsk. 36-38 samt av drätselkamm., lönendn o. arb :lösh :komm. ett flert. år. RVO.
translated: Eiserman, Carl Sixten, director, Borås, born on February 2, 1895 in Borås to director Carl E. and Otilda Gadde. Married in 1920 to Andrea Äkerlund. Children: Barbro born in 1921, Carl-Otto born in 1928. Studied at Chalmers University of Technology, Reutlingen Royal Technical College for Textile Industry in 1913 and received a DHS degree in 1917. Worked as an executive director at A-B Sv:es Fören. Trikåfabr. from 1920-1931, executive director at Åkerlunds Bomulfespinneri A-B from 1931-1938, at Drufvefors Väfveri A-B from 1936-1938, and at Åkerlunds Bomulissp. in Borås from 1938 onwards. Chairman of the board and vice-chairman at Sv. Hand:banken in Borås, A-B Borås Tidn., chairman and executive director at A-B Sv:es Fören. Trikåfabr., member of the board of Kilsunds’ A-B, member of the overboard of Sv:es textilind: förb., vice-chairman of DES's Borås-district, vice-chairman of Västergötl. and n. Hall. trade chamber, member of the city council in Borås from 1930-1938, member of the municipal committees for preparation of decisions, budgets, and unemployment for several years. Also a recipient of RVO.

alumniOf.name: Reutlingen Royal Technical College for Textile Industry
